channel.title: DatBird's AMA- a little late 6 month Anniversary on the forums
channel.description: Hey I love everyone here, thanks for embracing me into this great community. If you have any questions send them and I'll try and answer them. Plus work is just boring. So I needed something to make it a bit bearable

item.source: DatBird's AMA- a little late 6 month Anniversary on the forums

item.title: DatBird's AMA- a little late 6 month Anniversary on the forums
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
Geyde:

What do you think you need to improve on in FM?

A lot of things. First need to not soft my role two seconds into day 2 like every game. Not to be brutally honest to the point where I out that Im a Fanatic for reasons I still dont know. I gotta stop thinking that just because someone pushes on me doesnt mean they are scum even though the percentage has been rather high recently. Start pushing more and trying to be a town leader. I have a hard time doing this, especially when I’m not confirmed. I feel like in NDFM and the recent Priest game I had that confidence but I had to either kill scum or out my role to get there. Like I just need to stop being scared and just do it. Scum game needs improvement because my usual behavior just resorts to low post numbers and failing for reaction tests. Overall I feel improvement but I’m still lacking in a lot of categories

Geyde:

How do you think the moderation team could improve this forum?

Go back in time and stop February from happening. RIP best boi /s. But for serious, I have been loving the constant updates of the FOL changes thread, constantly trying to improve the game is what keeps FOL one of the most interesting categories imo. One thing that could help (at least me) is show the before and after classcards just because sometimes I’m like what even was that ability that got removed? Another thing would be to make sure things get pushed to the right thread if things get off topic. Another thing idk who made it but the beginners guide that was included in FOL 19 (think it was the one Solic hosted) class card thread at least for mine was really nice because it had links to all the class cards, common abbreviations (my biggest enemy), and just more tips. Idc how much I play that sheet was useful. Also make sure you guys dont let to many game start ups be up at once, especially when some games are taking a good bit to fill, because rn theres like so many games and I gotta pick and choose. Moderation wise, you guys have been great and I appreciate all the work you guys do to keep this running because honestly I was so scared this place was gonna die.

Read full topic

item.title: DatBird's AMA- a little late 6 month Anniversary on the forums
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
The definition for the noun: an item of food consisting of two pieces of bread with meat, cheese, or other filling between them, eaten as a light meal.
The definition for the verb:insert or squeeze (someone or something) between two other people or things, typically in a restricted space or so as to be uncomfortable.
So if we go by the noun

Geyde:

Is a BLT a sandwich? Yes
Is a chip butty a sandwich? Never heard of it so idk
Is Icecream between waffles a sandwich? I count waffles bread like so yes
Is a sub a sandwich? Depends on the sub, if it’s one bread sliced no. If it’s one piece of bread cut completely then yes.
Is a hotdog a sandwich? Same as the sub
Is an ice cream taco a sandwich? Because it’s not two individuals pieces no
Is a chicken wrap a sandwich? Same as taco
Is a burrito a sandwich? Same as taco
Is a poptart a sandwich? Same as taco

Now if we go with the act of sandwiching it’s the same out of principle that tacos, burritos, and pop tarts are one item holding a bunch of things not two. Subs/hotdogs are in a schrodinger’s cat like state until the first bite(in which case its either a sandwich or not is derived) in which if the bread was cut too much or it ripped it’s a sandwich but if not and it’s one piece of bread

Read full topic
